commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Hmm, we're so close, but it's not quite there yet.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I'm sorry. I practiced on my own and everything...

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Argh! Why won't this go right?!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It's okay. I can tell you're both trying your best. Let's be patient and solve one issue at a time.

commands.speaker: Hanayo ＆ Yoshiko
commands.line: All right...

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: One, two, three, four. One, two, three, four. Yoshiko, you're too far forward.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I don't mean to be!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: And yet you are. Just watch out for it.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: One, two, three four. One, two, three four. Hanayo, you're off by a beat.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: O-Okay!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: You don't have to rush. Also, you can stand more in front, closer to Yoshiko.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Got it!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: One, two, three, four. One, two, three, four, and...stop.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: This is the most exciting scene of the play, where you're chasing after the thief. You two need to be in perfect sync for it.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: It's a fast-paced song and dance, so that the villain doesn't get a chance to argue. If you're out of sync, even by just a little bit, the tension won't build...

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I know that.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Even though we're still singing and dancing, this feels completely different from our usual live show preparation. Musicals are really hard to do.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: We express ourselves fine during our live shows, but musicals have to also tell a story. It's tricky because we need to act well, too.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: So even if you two think you're cooperating together, maybe you're both preoccupied with all the extra work you're putting into your performance.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I see... You could be right about that.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I hate to admit it, but I'm not sure I can concentrate on everything at once.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: If that's true, then it's even more important to look at the entire stage to understand your role...

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: No, scratch that. In this musical, the two of you make up the lead role. So, why don't you try simply observing your partner standing next to you?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: My partner...

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: ...standing next to me...?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, whoops! I'm supposed to go check on the sets now.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I need to go do something also. Good luck, you two!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Okay. Let's continue practicing. Try acting while keeping your partner in mind. Got that?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko ＆ Hanayo
commands.line: Got it!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: We have a big problem!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Wh-Whoa, you scared me! What's wrong?!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: It's a... Th-Thief... We've been robbed!

commands.speaker: Hanayo ＆ Yoshiko
commands.line: A thief?!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Heh, heheh! I pity that thief...

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Because I, the world's best detective who can solve any case, am here!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I am Yohane, the famous detective! Come along, Hanayo!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Huh? What?!
